objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Advanced Electronic Viewfinder
• Fast Autofocus System
• Full HD Video Recording

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro design with modern functionality
• Advanced 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II APS-C sensor
• High-precision electronic viewfinder with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Tiltable 3.0-inch LCD screen for versatile shooting angles
• Fast autofocus system with 77 AF points
• Built-in Wi-Fi for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability
• Compatible with Fujifilm X-mount lenses
• Compact and lightweight body perfect for travel
• Multiple manual control dials for precise settings adjustment
• Film simulation modes for creative expression
• Weather-sealed construction for durability
• Up to 8 FPS continuous shooting speed
• Advanced filters and creative shooting modes

banner_details:
The banner design features a sleek, modern layout highlighting a featured mirrorless digital camera product. It uses a visually segmented dark grid background with quadrant-based color shades to provide structural depth. Prominent at the top left is a bold white header (`heading`) accompanied by an eye-catching orange subheading (`subheading`). Just below, a refined tagline (`tagline`) in a compact tech-styled font emphasizes the product type. Center-right shows a high-resolution product image (`product_image`). The description (`description`) lists four bullet-point features, followed by a bold price text (`price`). Finally, a vibrant call-to-action button comprised of a colored rectangle (`cta_background`) with a contrasting label (`cta`) invites user interaction.

**Color Palette**:
- Charcoal Black: #1A1A1A
- Dark Gray: #252525, #151515, #121212, #2A2A2A
- Bright Orange: #FF3A00
- Pure White: #FFFFFF
- Light Gray Text: #E0E0E0
product_color: The product image showcases a Fujifilm X-T10 camera, featuring a sleek, matte black body with metallic accents, emphasizing precision and modern design. Black (#1C1C1C) dominates the body, giving it a premium, professional feel. Light grey highlights (#D1D1D1) on text and numeric dials create contrast and readability. Subtle silver details (#A2A2A2) blend into the frame and rings, enhancing texture and structure. Red (#FF2D2D) and orange (#FF8500) markings near the lens ring subtly draw attention to functionality and focus zones. The lens glass reflects hints of greenish-yellow (#D4E976), adding depth. These colors blend harmoniously while highlighting key features of the product.
